Trigger.name: Vurus

regexCodeList.string: ^(You) call upon the spirit of Vurus and form an ethereal dagger in your hand. Dashing behind the oblivious form of (.+), you plant the dagger in \w+ back\.$
^(\w+) holds one hand out to \w+ side\. As an ethereal dagger appears there, \w+ dashes behind the oblivious form of (.+) and plants the dagger in \w+ back\.$
^(You) call upon the spirit of Vurus and form an ethereal dagger in your hand. Dashing behind (.+), you plant the dagger in \w+ back\.$
^(\w+) holds one hand out to \w+ side\. As an ethereal dagger appears there, \w+ dashes behind (.+) and plants the dagger in \w+ back\.$
^(You) call upon the spirit of Vurus and form an ethereal dagger in your hand\. You dash behind (.+), but are only able to strike a glancing blow as \w+ dodges aside\.$
^(\w+) holds one hand out to \w+ side\. As an ethereal dagger appears there, \w+ dashes behind (.+) but is only able to deliver a glancing blow\.$
